subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ross Drummond of Scotland matched the low round with a four-under-par 66 to grab the second-round lead by two strokes at the Senior P.G.A. Championship in Beachwood, Ohio.
snippet: Ross Drummond of Scotland matched the low round with a four-under-par 66 to grab the second-round lead by two strokes at the Senior P.G.A. Championship in Beachwood, Ohio.
